page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT HOLBEACH DROVE
page.content:
FARMING IS OF COURSE THE MAIN EMPLOYMENT IN THE AREA AND HORTICULTURE. THERE IS A GROWING CONCERN IN THE 1980's AS REGARDS UNEMPLOYMENT.
THERE ARE ALOT OF RETIRED PEOPLE FROM PROFESSIONAL EMPLOYMENTS SUCH AS BUSINESSMEN AND THE TEACHING PROFESSION. MANY PEOPLE COMMUTE TO PETERBOROUGH BOSTON AND EVEN TO THE CITY OF LONDON TO EARN THEIR LIVING. THE NEAREST JOB CENTRE IS IN HOLBEACH OR SPALDING. JOBS ARE ADVERTISED IN THE LOCAL PAPERS.
A FEW TRY THEIR HAND AT SELF EMPLOYMENT SUCH AS PLUMBING CARPENTRY ELECTRICS ETC WHICH IS VERY USEFUL IN AN EMERGENCY IN THE COUNTRY TO HAVE HELP CLOSE TO HAND> .
